dj.name: Swinger Mae
introLines: Dust off those boots, swing time is back.
If the world ends, we end it dancing.

ads: Smooth moves need smooth soles — grab Vault-Tec polish today.
Wasteland Swing reminds you: hydrate before you jitterbug.
interstitials: Keep the rhythm steady — more brass on the way.
You bring the steps, we bring the swing.
